I saw this very recently.  No noticably bad behavior should result since a refresh is very likely to happen immediately after.  Hard to reproduce but happens when modificatoins to the Task List and refresh happen at the same time.
*** Bug 152358 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Should be fixed now, but I'm a bit confused as to how this could have occurred given that the code was within a synchronized block around a synchronized list.  So leaving open as a reminder for now, please comment if you see this again.

Yup.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 155712 ***
